main event: A pilot reported seeing a large round mass flashing white and blue light while flying near Harmon on 2 May 1955.
interesting points: The object was observed for approximately 5 minutes,It appeared similar to a mass of burning gases,The pilot estimated the object to be about 15 miles away,It was not the sun or another aircraft,The object remained visible even at a distance of 100 miles from Harmon.
sighted object: large round mass flashing white and blue light
